<a id="VisualShaderNodeParticleRingEmitter"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeParticleRingEmitter

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeParticleEmitter](VisualShaderNodeParticleEmitter.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A visual shader node that makes particles emitted in a ring shape.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

[VisualShaderNodeParticleEmitter](VisualShaderNodeParticleEmitter.md) that makes the particles emitted in ring shape with the specified inner and outer radii and height.
